title: Hollywood Offers Up A Bevy Of Superheroes In 'Avengers: Age of Ultron'
teaser: Reviewer David Edelstein says Joss Whedon's new film plays like "a strategic set-up for a Hollywood franchise." Viewers will be blitzed by sound and fury â€” and a certain amount of "gobbledegook."
